history.content:
Today's tech company faces two core imperatives: to scale (be bigger) and to be ethical (be good). What kinds of human contexts and ethical concerns should your company lookout for while you are a start-up and what changes, ethically, when you scale up?
-
SWE will be hosting a workshop with Skydeck through their Startup Spring series that invites students to interrogate how ethics relate to scale at the intersection of their specific technology and business plan.
-
Students will learn about the ethics of starting your business in Silicon Valley and scaling up to the globe, about working with public and democratic institutions, and social science tools to keep a robust and reflective concept of the social good insight at every step. Skydeck will also be discussing women in engineering startups.

Link to FB Page: https://fb.me/e/1jnzsq4mp

Zoom Link: https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/94489077907
history.subject: SkyDeck x SWE: Understanding Ethical Innovation
